short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your Twitter social circle! Our plugin blocks cryptocurrency phishing ads on Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No need to subscribe to Premium+ to have an ad-free timeline.

Protect your Twitter social circle! Our plugin blocks cryptocurrency phishing ads on Twitter, allowing you to navigate social networks without worrying about misinformation. Enjoy a clean, secure Twitter experience, engage with friends, and stay safe from scams!
